generated_body: The article titled "Divers salvage 100-year-old liquor from WWI shipwreck" is likely to provide a detailed account of an underwater recovery operation where divers retrieve bottles of liquor from a shipwreck dating back to World War I. Readers may expect to learn about the historical context of the ship, the significance of the salvaged liquor, and any unique characteristics of the bottles that were recovered. The article may also discuss the challenges faced by the divers during the salvage process and the potential value of the liquor, both monetarily and historically.
